overview: Abla is tortured by her father and imprisons her in his palace, because her mother betrayed him, and he fears that his daughter will become like her mother. But her cousin Abdullah, who had not seen her in his entire life, loves her, and decided to save her from the cruelty of her father. He agreed with his vile friends, Ibrahim and Fathi, to storm the palace and kidnap Abla, who does not know him and has not seen him before.
title: هروب الأوغاد
